classRec.name: BBMContactUpdateTypes
classRec.description:
The types of updates that a user or a contact can make to their BBM profile.

Update types are used to determine which property was updated when a BBMContactEvent event is dispatched.

field.name: DISPLAY_NAME
field.description: Indicates that the display name has changed.

field.name: DISPLAY_PICTURE
field.description: Indicates that the display picture has changed.

field.name: INSTALL_APP
field.description: Indicates that your app was installed/enabled.

field.name: PERSONAL_MESSAGE
field.description: Indicates that the personal message has changed.

field.name: STATUS
field.description: Indicates that the status has changed.

field.name: UNINSTALL_APP
field.description: Indicates that your app was uninstalled/disabled.

classRec.name: BBMResult
classRec.description: Result codes that can be returned by a function.

field.name: ASYNC
field.description: Indicates that an operation will be completed asynchronously.

field.name: FAILURE
field.description: Indicates that a function did not complete successfully.

field.name: SUCCESS
field.description: Indicates that a function has completed successfully.

classRec.name: BBMContactStatus
classRec.description: Represents the status of the device User or a BBMContact.

field.name: AVAILABLE
field.description: User status that indicates that the user is available.

field.name: BUSY
field.description: User status that indicates that the user is busy.

classRec.name: BBMContact
classRec.description:
Represents a contact in the BBM Social Platform.

BBMContact is a class that represents a contact accessible through the BBM Social Platform. The class provides accessor methods to the main attributes of the contact including display name, message and status.

method.name: BBMContact
method.description:
Creates a BBMContact instance.

BBMContact instances are created by the BBMManager class and should not be directly instaniated.
method.param: id The id of the contact.
name The name of the contact.
message The message of the contact.
statusMessage The status message of the contact.
appVersion The app version the contact has installed.
status The status of the contact.
profileurl The url for the profile image of the contact.

method.name: appVersion
method.description: Retrieve a contact's version of the app that they have installed.

method.name: displayName
method.description: Retrieve a contact's display name.

method.name: id
method.description:
Retrieve a contact's id.

The user's PPID is the same across multiple instances of BBM (for example, on a BlackBerry smartphone and a BlackBerry tablet), when the user signs in with the same BlackBerry ID. The ID is encoded as a Base64 string using the ASCII character set.

method.name: personalMessage
method.description: Retrieve a contact's personal message.

method.name: personalStatus
method.description: Retrieve a contact's status message.

method.name: profileUrl
method.description: Retrieve the url for a contact's profile image.

method.name: status
method.description:
Retrieve a contact's status.

Valid values can be found in the BBMContactStatus class.

classRec.name: BBMProfileBoxItem
classRec.description:
Represents a profile box item in the BBM Social Platform.

BBMProfileBoxItem is a class that represents a profile box item accessible through the BBM Social Platform. The class provides accessor methods to the main attributes of the ProfileBoxItem including cookie, id, iconId and text.

method.name: BBMProfileBoxItem
method.description:
Creates a BBMProfileBoxItem instance.

BBMProfileBoxItem instances are created by the BBMManager class and should not be directly instaniated.
method.param: id The id of the item.
text The text of the item.
cookie The cookie of the item.
iconId The icon id of the item.
iconUrl The url of the icon.

method.name: retrieveIcon
method.description:
Retrieves the icon from the BBM Social Platform.

Retrieving the icon occurs asynchronously and once completed the iconUrl property is updated.

method.name: cookie
method.description: Retrieve the cookie of the item.

method.name: iconId
method.description: Retrieve the icon id of the item.

method.name: iconUrl
method.description:
Retrieve the url for the icon of the item.

If null, application developers should call theretrieveIcon() icon method in order to get the url to the icon. When the icon url is retrieved, this property is automatically updated with the url.

method.name: id
method.description: Retrieve the id of the item.

method.name: text
method.description: Retrieve the text of the item.

classRec.name: BBMUserProfile
classRec.description:
Represents the device User in the BBM Social Platform.

BBMUserProfile is a class that represents the device user in the BBM Social Platform. The class provides getters and setters to attributes of the device User.

method.name: BBMUserProfile
method.description:
Creates a BBMUserProfile instance.

BBMUserProfile instances are created by the BBMManager class and should not be directly instaniated.
method.param: id The id of the user.
name The name of the user.
message The message of the user.
statusMessage The status message of the user.
appVersion The app version the user has installed.
status The status of the user.
profileurl The url for the profile image of the user.

method.name: setPersonalMessage
method.description:
Set the personal message of the user.

When setting the personal message a dialog displays to allow the user to accept or reject the change. A personal message is limited to 160 characters; anything longer is truncated. If null is passed in, the personal message is cleared.
method.param: message The message to set.
method.return: Returns BBMResult.ASYNC if successful in sending the request, otherwise BBMResult.FAILURE.

method.name: setProfileUrl
method.description:
Sets the url of the profile image for the user.

When setting the profile url, the image is uploaded to the BBM Social Platform servers. A dialog displays to allow the user to accept or reject the change to the user's BBM display picture. The display picture is limited to 32kB of data; an attempt to set a display picture that exceeds this limit will fail and will not display the dialog.
method.return: Returns BBMResult.ASYNC if successful in sending the request, otherwise BBMResult.FAILURE.

method.name: setStatus
method.description: Sets the status of the user.
method.param: status The status of the user. Valid values can be found in the BBMContactStatus class.
message The personal status of the user.
method.return: Returns BBMResult.ASYNC if successful in sending the request, otherwise BBMResult.FAILURE.

method.name: appVersion
method.description: Gets the version of the application installed.

method.name: displayName
method.description: Get the display name of the user.

method.name: id
method.description: Get the id of the user.

method.name: personalMessage
method.description: Get the personal message of the user.

method.name: personalStatus
method.description: Get or set the personal status of the user.

method.name: profileUrl
method.description: Gets the url of the profile image for the user.

method.name: status
method.description:
Gets or sets the users status.

Valid values can be found in the BBMContactStatus class.

classRec.name: BBMManager
classRec.description:
The BBMManager class is used to interact with the BBM Social Platform.

For example, you can:

  • Invite BBM contacts to download your app by accessing a user's BBM contact list.
  • Update a user's BBM personal message, status, and avatar.
  • Add a customizable application box to a user's BBM profile to broadcast achievements or provide updates.

Applications wishing to use the BBMManager must ensure that their application includes the following permission in their bar-descriptor.xml file.
<permission>bbm_connect</permission>

Connecting to the BBM Social Platform starts with registering your app. The BBM Social Platform APIs are not generally available for use until the app is registered. Successful registration is indicated when BBMRegisterEvent.SUCCESS event is recieved.

Event.name: userProfileUpdate
Event.description: Dispatched when the user profile is updated.

Event.name: register_denied
Event.description:
Dispatched when access to the BBM Social Platform is denied.

This is usually the result of the user turning off BBM in the application permissions.

Event.name: register_unregistered
Event.description: Dispatched when the application is not registered with the BBM Social Platform.

Event.name: register_pending
Event.description: Dispatched when the application is in the process of registering with the BBM Social Platform.

Event.name: register_success
Event.description: Dispatched when the application has successfully registered with the BBM Social Platform.

Event.name: contact_update
Event.description: Dispatched when a contact is updated.

Event.name: contact_list
Event.description: Dispatched when the contact list is retrieved from the BBM Social Platform servers.

method.name: BBMManager
method.description:
Do not call directly.

Use the BBMManager.bbmManager property to return the singelton instance of this class.
method.param: enforcer The singleton enforcer to help prevent accidental instaniation of this class directly.

method.name: addProfileBoxItem
method.description:
Add an item to a user's profile box.

A profile box item consists of an image, text, and a customizable string (cookie).
method.param: text The item text must not be null or empty. It can have a maximum of 100 characters, with no more than 2 new line characters.
cookie The cookie can be null, with a maximum of 128 characters.
iconId Must be that of a registered image, or < 0 if this item has no image.
method.returns: Returns one of the values defined in BBMResult.

method.name: canSendBBMInvite
method.description:
Determine whether this user has allowed other users of this application to send this user invitations to become a BBM contact.

This function will return an accurate value only if you have access to the BBM Social Platform (i.e. if isAccessAllowed() returns true).

The user can modify this permission through the global settings application.

method.name: canShowProfileBox
method.description:
Determine whether the user has allowed this application and its application activities to appear in their BBM profile.

You can use this function to determine whether your profile box is being displayed on the user's profile. This function will return an accurate value only if you have access to the BBM Social Platform (i.e. if isAccessAllowed() returns true).

The user can modify this permission through the global settings application.
method.return: Returns true if profile box items can be shown.

method.name: getUserProfile
method.description: Retrieve the user's BBM profile information.

method.name: isAccessAllowed
method.description:
Determine whether access to the BBM Social Platform is allowed.

Access is not allowed until a successful registration has taken place.

method.name: registerApplication
method.description:
Register your app with the BBM Social Platform.

A UUID is a unique, 128-bit, 36-character identifier that you generate for your app using a UUID generator. The UUID string must conform to the Microsoft 8-4-4-4-12 format (xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx).

A progress registration dialog may appear in your application after you invoke this function. The user will be able to cancel the registration by dismissing the dialog. Once the registration is completed, a system toast may appear indicating to the user that your application is now connected to BBM.

If BBM is not setup when registration starts, the user may decide to setup BBM. This action will trigger the registration to resume.

BBMRegisterEvent events are dispatched during the registration process.
method.param: uuid The application's uuid.

method.name: registerIcon
method.description:
Register an image with the BBM Social Platform for use with profile box items.

Registering an image uploads it to the user's BlackBerry device for use when the app is not running. This process takes place asynchronously. Images should be registered using the same ID on different devices and in different versions of your app because images are distributed on a peer-to-peer basis between devices.

If canShowProfileBox() returns false, this method will return BBMResult.FAILURE.
method.param: path The file path to the image. For example, File.applicationDirectory.resolvePath("assets/apple.png").nativePath
id The unique ID of the image. Must be > 0.
method.returns: Returns one of the values defined in BBMResult.

method.name: removeAllProfileBoxItems
method.description:
Remove all items in the profile box from the user's BlackBerry device.

This process takes place asynchronously. If canShowProfileBox() returns false, this method will return BBMResult.FAILURE.

Once the items are removed the profileBoxItems list is automatically updated.
method.returns: Returns one of the values defined in BBMResult.

method.name: removeProfileBoxItem
method.description:
Remove a profile box item from the user's BBM profile box.

This process takes place asynchronously. If canShowProfileBox() returns false, this method will return BBMResult.FAILURE.

Once the item is removed the profileBoxItems list is automatically updated.
method.param: id The id of the item to remove.
method.returns: Returns one of the values defined in BBMResult.

method.name: sendDownloadInvitation
method.description:
Returns true if a download invitation can be sent.

This method will always return false before a successful registration.
method.return: Returns true if inviations can be sent.

method.name: bbmManager
method.description: Returns the singelton instance of BBMManager
method.return: The singleton instance of the class.

method.name: contacts
method.description:
Returns a list of BBM contacts that have the application installed.

The IDataProvider list is populated with BBMContact objects.

It is important that you do not modify this list in any way. The list of contacts is managed strictly by this class. Modifiying the list could lead to potential issues.
method.return: A IDataProvider instance that can easily be set as a dataProvider for a List instance.

method.name: profileBoxItems
method.description:
Returns a list of user profile box items for the current user.

The IDataProvider list is populated with BBMProfileBoxItem objects.

In order to access the users profile box items, the canShowProfileBox() method must return true.

It is important that you do not modify this list in any way. The list of profile box items is managed strictly by this class. Modifiying the list could lead to potential issues.
method.return: A IDataProvider instance that can easily be set as a dataProvider for a List instance.

method.name: version
method.description:
Gets the version number of the BBM Social Platform.

Retrieves the version of the BBM Social Platform library that your application is using. You can use the version number to check whether your application is compatible with this version of the BBM Social Platform.
method.return: The version number of the BBM Social Platform library in the format.

classRec.name: BBMContactEvent
classRec.description: BBMContactEvent events are dispatched by the BBMManager class when contacts are updated.

method.name: BBMContactEvent
method.description: Creates a BBMContactEvent instance.
method.param: type The type of event.
contact The contact for the event.
updateType The updateType of the event.

method.name: contact
method.description: The contact that was updated.

method.name: updateType
method.description:
Defines what was updated for the specified contact.

Valid values can be found in BBMContactupdateTypes

field.name: CONTACT_LIST
field.description:
Event type dispatched when the contact list is retrieved from the BBM Social Platform servers.

The BBMContactEvent.CONTACT_LIST constant defines the value of the type property of the event object for an contact_list event.

The properties of the event object have the following values:

PropertyValue
bubblesfalse
cancelablefalse
contactThe contact property is null for this event type.
currentTargetThe object that is actively processing the Event object with an event listener.
typeBBMContactEvent.CONTACT_LIST
updateTypeThe updateType property is null for this event type.

field.name: CONTACT_UPDATE
field.description:
Event type dispatched when a contact is updated.

The BBMContactEvent.CONTACT_UPDATE constant defines the value of the type property of the event object for an contact_update event.

The properties of the event object have the following values:

PropertyValue
bubblesfalse
cancelablefalse
contactThe contact that was updated.
currentTargetThe object that is actively processing the Event object with an event listener.
typeBBMContactEvent.CONTACT_UPDATE
updateTypeThe property that of the contact that was updated.

classRec.name: BBMUserProfileEvent
classRec.description: BBMUserProfileEvent events are dispatched by the BBMManager class when the users profile is updated.

method.name: BBMUserProfileEvent
method.description: Creates a BBMUserProfileEvent instance.
method.param: type The type of event.
updateType The type of update.

method.name: updateType
method.description:
Defines what was updated for the specified user profile.

Valid values can be found in BBMContactupdateTypes

field.name: UPDATE
field.description:
Event type dispatched when the user profile is updated.

The BBMUserProfileEvent.UPDATE constant defines the value of the type property of the event object for an userProfileUpdate event.

The properties of the event object have the following values:

PropertyValue
bubblesfalse
cancelablefalse
currentTargetThe object that is actively processing the Event object with an event listener.
typeBBMUserProfileEvent.UPDATE
updateTypeWhat was updated in the users profile.

classRec.name: BBMRegisterEvent
classRec.description: BBMRegisterEvent events are dispatched by the BBMManager class when registration events occur.

method.name: BBMRegisterEvent
method.description: Creates a BBMRegisterEvent instance.
method.param: type The type of event.

field.name: DENIED
field.description:
Event type dispatched when access to the BBM Social Platform is denied. This is usually the result of the user turning off BBM in the application permissions.

The BBMRegisterEvent.DENIED constant defines the value of the type property of the event object for an register_denied event.

The properties of the event object have the following values:

PropertyValue
bubblesfalse
cancelablefalse
currentTargetThe object that is actively processing the Event object with an event listener.
typeBBMRegisterEvent.DENIED

field.name: PENDING
field.description:
Event type dispatched when the application is in the process of registering with the BBM Social Platform.

The BBMRegisterEvent.PENDING constant defines the value of the type property of the event object for an register_pending event.

The properties of the event object have the following values:

PropertyValue
bubblesfalse
cancelablefalse
currentTargetThe object that is actively processing the Event object with an event listener.
typeBBMRegisterEvent.PENDING

field.name: SUCCESS
field.description:
Event type dispatched when the application has successfully registered with the BBM Social Platform.

The BBMRegisterEvent.SUCCESS constant defines the value of the type property of the event object for an register_success event.

The properties of the event object have the following values:

PropertyValue
bubblesfalse
cancelablefalse
currentTargetThe object that is actively processing the Event object with an event listener.
typeBBMRegisterEvent.SUCCESS

field.name: UNREGISTERED
field.description:
Event type dispatched when the application is not registered with the BBM Social Platform.

The BBMRegisterEvent.UNREGISTERED constant defines the value of the type property of the event object for an register_unregistered event.

The properties of the event object have the following values:

PropertyValue
bubblesfalse
cancelablefalse
currentTargetThe object that is actively processing the Event object with an event listener.
typeBBMRegisterEvent.UNREGISTERED

Event.name: dataChange
Event.description: Dispatched when the items are added, removed or updated.

method.name: BBMDataProvider
method.description: Creates a new BBMDataProvider instance.

method.name: clone
method.description: Creates a clone of this BBMDataProvider. The new instance contains the same data.
